price: “A ja sam upravo izaslanik Gospodara tvog”, reče on, “da ti poklonim dječaka čista!”
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَٰمٗا زَكِيّٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā anā rasūlu rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulāman zakiyyan
